programme.title: Life

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A journey into the uncharted corners of the ocean where the newest discoveries are being made and where the strangest sea creatures can be found.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Enter the world of plants as time-lapse technology makes this violent and self-seeking organism's behaviour a truly dynamic and surprisingly emotional experience.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The ultimate portrait of our planet looks at the key factors that shape our natural history. In the Arctic spring, a mother polar bear and cubs have two weeks to cross the frozen sea. Time-lapse cameras capture the transformation created by floods.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A tour of the mountain ranges reveals how animals rise to the challenge of mountain life. The snow leopard finds habitat in the largest glaciers of the world.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Follow the descent of rivers from their mountain sources to the sea. Witness unique and dramatic moments of animal behaviour, including a piranha frenzy and a showdown between otters and crocodiles.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Although often overlooked, caves are remarkable habitats with equally bizarre wildlife. This documentary provides a unique access to a hidden world of stalactites, stalagmites, snotites and troglodytes that brings a wealth of surprises.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Deserts cover one fifth of the planet and they are spreading every year. We think we are familiar with the Sahara and the Kalahari but what about the Gobi or the Atacama -so many deserts have hardly been explored.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: The Arctic and Antarctic experience the most extreme seasons on Earth. Time-lapse cameras watch a colony of penguins, while aerial images show a polar bear swimming more than 100 km.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: After filming for three years, the shy Mongolian gazelle and the bizarre-looking Tibetan fox are captured on film. Over six weeks, the team follows a pride of 30 lions as they attempt to hunt elephants.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: Jungles cover roughly three per cent of our planet yet contain 50 per cent of the world's species. In the Ngogo forest, the largest chimpanzee group defends its territory from neighbouring groups. Other specialists include a parasitic fungi.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: A humpback whale mother and calf embark on a journey from tropical coral paradises to storm-ravaged polar seas. Indonesian coral reefs reveal seahorses, clams and sea kraits. Bull fur seals attack king penguins, and sea urchins fell forests of kelp.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: From the evergreen forests of the frozen north to the deciduous dry forests of the Equator, discover the greatest woodlands on Earth.

programme.title: Planet Earth
programme.desc: In the ocean, life goes to extraordinary lengths to survive this immense realm. A 30-tonne whale shark gorges on a school of fish. Deep sea octopus fly in the abyss and vampire squid use bioluminescence to create a colour display.

programme.title: Planet Earth: A Celebration
programme.desc: This program highlights eight of the most extraordinary sequences from 'Planet Earth II' and 'Blue Planet II.' In addition to new narration, the sequences will include an arrangement of original scores from composer Hans Zimmer and Jacob Shea.

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: The very best highlights of the series, taking viewers on a spectacular journey through the entire polar year, from the depths of winter to the melting world of the polar summer.

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: The polar regions experience the planet's most extreme seasons and are home to some of its most surprising animal behaviours. Polar bears search and fight for mates, penguins surf and orcas hunt collaboratively.

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: Spring arrives in the poles and the sun appears after many months of darkness, as do the adelie penguins. In the Antarctic, the sun seems welcoming but its return triggers fierce katabatic winds.

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: The summertime is a time when the harshest environments on Earth temporarily become favourable for most. While the sun never sets, life speeds up for polar wildlife in a race to raise their young.

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: For the animals of the Polar Regions, time is running out in the autumn. The Arctic Ocean freezes over and the sea ice advances around Antarctica.

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: There is no greater challenge for life than winter in the Polar Regions. As temperatures plummet to 70 degrees below zero Fahrenheit, witness the greatest test of survival on the planet.

programme.title: Grave Secrets
programme.desc: In 2001, parishioners arrive at church, unaware that they are passing a grisly crime scene in their own parking lot. Someone has stabbed Tracey Bagwell in her car 30 times. Police soon discover that Tracey knew a secret... one worth killing for.

programme.title: Stranger Among Us
programme.desc: After a long-lost daughter reunites with her family, their peaceful Florida neighborhood is devastated by scandal, betrayal, and a double-murder.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: 60-year old stonemason David Riemens, needs has one final meeting before driving to visit family. But he never returns home, and his truck is found abandoned. Desperate to find him, investigators look for clues, but David has vanished into thin air.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Waitress Brandy Hanna leaves work Friday afternoon for a weekend off. But Monday morning, when she doesn't show up for work, her mother is convinced Brandy is in trouble.

programme.title: The Object of Murder
programme.desc: In 2011, 20-year-old Holly Bobo was abducted from her home in rural Tennessee. A search turned up some of her personal items, including her cell phone. But Holly was gone. The trail went cold for two years until a hunter made a gruesome find.

programme.title: Killer Unknown
programme.desc: On the Dean case, phones are confiscated with a new plan to comb through communications between persons of interest. Will the data reveal incriminating information? On the Woodson case, Huff thinks a suspect's family may be hiding something.

programme.title: Grave Mysteries
programme.desc: In the wake of a broken marriage, 28-year old Samantha Lezark's struggle to find love again has a fatal ending. Now, investigators must follow her digital trail through different chat rooms to uncover her killer.

programme.title: Six Degrees of Murder
programme.desc: Young mother of three Christine Sheddy is trying to put her life back on track after tragedy and heartbreak. But just when she's on the verge of a fresh start, she disappears without a trace and every person in her life becomes a suspect.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: Single mom Erin installs a security system when she realizes that someone's been inside her home. But that doesn't stop the intruder from breaking in, determined to end her life as well as his own.

programme.title: Nightmare Next Door
programme.desc: When thirteen-year-old Texas City girl Krystal Baker is found dead off the banks of the Galveston Bay, investigators round up a herd of suspects. But with little physical evidence on the scene, it takes a dedicated detective to solve this case.

programme.title: The Night That Didn't End
programme.desc: In the great smoky mountains of North Carolina, Billy Carter raises his daughters Crystal and Misty. When a body is found on the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway, this family's piece of paradise becomes a nightmare they relive again and again.

programme.title: Welcome to Murdertown
programme.desc: 14-year-old Christie Mullins is murdered in Clintonville, Ohio. The murder is unsolved for forty years until a young woman comes forward to identify her uncle as the killer. He is revealed to have a surprising connection to his victim.

programme.title: The Perfect Murder
programme.desc: New York City fashion photographer Joel Schoenfeld is shot dead in his Greenwich Village studio one cold January morning. Joel appears to have it all, but detectives will eventually uncover a dark secret and a twisted tale of revenge..

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: As a prominent family awakens to noises in the night, their worst nightmare ensues when their beloved daughter Terri Ann McCoy is fatally shot. Investigators work through leads and lies to discover the perpetrators were closer than they realized.

programme.title: Diabolical
programme.desc: A young family in La Mirada, CA is out for an evening stroll when terror strikes. For investigation nothing seems to add up. Is it random violence or a mastermind at work? The truth will take years to emerge.

programme.title: Your Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: The Millers always thought something was off with their oldest son Steven. But as he slips from strange into sinister, there's no telling how far Steven will go to get his respected New York family's attention.

programme.title: Fear Thy Roommate
programme.desc: A young woman craving independence moves out of her parents' house and in with her kind-hearted boss. But independence comes with a price, and when she is unable to pay, she loses control and more than one 'innocent' is slaughtered.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor
programme.desc: When someone new decides to build his dream home on a quiet street, neighbours take sides. Long-time friends become hard-core enemies, and death is just around the corner.

programme.desc: Rebecca Simpson lives a picturesque, luxurious life with everything she could ever want. Yearning for more excitement, she begins an affair that ultimately puts her life in a downward spiral filled with jealousy, obsession and a thirst for murder.

programme.title: Cold Hearted
programme.desc: James is a Marine living the American dream. His duty often takes him away from home, but he still provides for his family. While away his wife seeks companionship closer to home. A sordid affair culminates in an explosive revelation.

programme.title: Dangerous Persuasions
programme.desc: Angela King is a troubled teenager who falls in with the wrong crowd. She becomes a white supremacist preaching hate and inflicting brutal attacks on innocent victims. It's only when she is sent to prison for armed robbery that she can find redemption.

programme.title: Dangerous Persuasions
programme.desc: Kerry Noble took his pregnant wife to a Christian commune, where he was led into a world of racism and mass-murder.

programme.title: Deadly Deception
programme.desc: Desperate to escape her chaotic life, a Colorado woman reunites with her high school sweatheart in Florida, but the consequences of this decision will be fatal.

programme.title: Deadly Deception

programme.title: Murder Among Friends
programme.desc: In Northern California, an anonymous tip leads detectives to a decaying corpse, buried at a mountain campsite. As police investigate their victim's past, they unveil a boisterous life of love, jealousy... and one truly shocking secret.

programme.title: Scorned: Love Kills
programme.desc: Stephanie is a former beauty queen and always dreamed of a high end lifestyle. When she is appointed as Dr. Stephens' head nurse, she is quickly charmed by both his charm and bank account and will stop at nothing to get the glamorous life she wants.

programme.title: The Lies that Bind
programme.desc: Karla leaves her home one night and never returns. The next day, her husband calls the police to file a missing person report. When the police uncover a treasure trove of hidden secrets, they have to decide who is telling the truth and who is lying.

programme.title: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: After the shocking death of Heather Maples, the student community of Murfreesboro, Tennessee confronts the sobering truth that a killer is lurking among them. Detectives unlock her cell phone to find a web potential suspects and her last steps.

programme.title: Heart of Darkness
programme.desc: A woman is found dead in her car by her husband and son.

programme.title: Fatal Vows
programme.desc: Gary and Helen have two kids, two cars, and a lot of love. When Gary's other love for blackjack becomes more of a habit than a hobby, he and Helen go to extraordinary lengths to recoup losses... leaving one behind bars and the other six feet under.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: Confident, motorcycle-riding Diane Snellen is a single mom trying to make her way in the world while navigating the dating scene of Georgetown, KY. But her path in life comes to an abrupt end when she's brutally stabbed in her own home.

programme.title: Married With Secrets
programme.desc: The decomposed body of a San Francisco businessman is found floating in the California Aqueduct. Investigators initially suspect a family member, but without evidence, the case goes cold. It will take detectives several decades to find the real killer.

programme.title: The Killer Beside Me
programme.desc: At work, Kerri Harris and her friend discover a camera secreted in the ladies' restroom. Police examine the evidence, but less than 24 hours into their investigation, Kerri is found stabbed to death in her office. Her co-workers are just feet away.

programme.desc: A deserted facility in the remote countryside features mysterious graffiti that may be highly advanced mathematical equations pointing to a dark secret; experts investigate this classified military wasteland with a deadly past.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: A mysterious American pyramid built out of Cold War paranoia, a haunted prison, and a strange cluster of structures in the Atlantic are mysterious deserted engineering projects are investigated.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Abandoned
programme.desc: An entrance to the underworld in the American wild, a haunting Soviet underwater prison, and a strange complex of towers in a forest of ice are deserted engineering projects, and new discoveries reveal how they were built and why they were abandoned.

programme.title: Black Files Declassified
programme.desc: A former CIA operative investigates newly declassified documents that reveal the secrets of a multibillion-dollar mission to build a real-life Iron Man equipped with superhuman strength, cutting-edge weapons, and telepathic abilities.

programme.title: Black Files Declassified
programme.desc: A former CIA operative investigates new evidence of a top-secret group known as the 'Nightstalkers,' a clandestine team of the world's best aviators involved in the assassination of Osama Bin Laden and other dangerous black ops.

programme.title: Black Files Declassified
programme.desc: Newly declassified document reveal the details of a top-secret government program created in the wake of the Kennedy assassination to go to extreme lengths to protect the president. A former CIA operative exposes the cutting-edge defenses now in place.

programme.title: Black Files Declassified
programme.desc: A top-secret aviation program funded by a mysterious money trail could have built a plane that can travel nearly 4,000 miles an hour; a former CIA operative investigates how these superplanes will revolutionize flight and unleash a new lethal technology.

programme.title: Black Files Declassified
programme.desc: A top-secret government program might have proof that aliens have visited earth, and a former CIA operative uses newly declassified documents and special access to investigate if the US military already has its hands on advanced, alien technology.

programme.title: Black Files Declassified
programme.desc: Newly declassified documents reveal that the US Space Force is the culmination of decades of top-secret military programs to weaponize the cosmos, and special access exposes the cutting-edge weapons and sci-fi defense systems behind real-life star wars.

programme.title: Crash Test World
programme.desc: Kari ventures to Doha, Qatar, on the Arabian Peninsula to discover how people rely on centuries-old customs and modern technology to grow food, find water and keep cool all while living in the desert.

programme.title: Crash Test World
programme.desc: With more than half of the world's population in cities, functions like transportation and waste management are a major challenge. Kari visits New York City, where urban planners, developers and kids in the Bronx work to make their city more livable.

programme.title: America's Lost Vikings
programme.desc: Expert archaeologists investigate the first confirmed Viking settlement in America, and using cutting-edge technology, they're making new discoveries that will change everything we know about American history.

programme.title: America's Lost Vikings
programme.desc: Experts investigate a mysterious set of clues that suggest the Vikings could have ventured deeper into North America, and using cutting-edge tech, they put Viking ships to the test to reveal how far they could have gone.

programme.title: America's Lost Vikings
programme.desc: New evidence reveals that Vikings and Native Americans might have fought a thousand years ago, and using cutting-edge tech, experts put their weaponry and tactics to the test to find out who might have won.

programme.title: America's Lost Vikings
programme.desc: A mysterious artifact might be evidence that Vikings reached the American Midwest, and to investigate this controversial theory, archaeologists build a Viking boat to test if their ships could manage a dangerous 1,000-mile journey over the Great Lakes.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Viking Stone
programme.desc: Hollywood actor Peter Stormare teams up with a Midwestern history enthusiast to investigate a mysterious relic that could be evidence of Viking settlement in America centuries before Columbus, but some think it's a hoax.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Viking Stone
programme.desc: Hollywood actor Peter Stormare and Elroy Balgaard investigate the man accused of forging evidence of Vikings in America, testing a crucial piece of evidence with DNA analysis: an ancient skull that may have alien origins.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Viking Stone
programme.desc: Hollywood actor Peter Stormare and Elroy Balgaard need to find more artifacts to support their case, so they arrange to meet a mysterious man with knowledge of the runestone at a secret location where he has something important to show them.

programme.title: Strange Evidence
